Comments.Message: Is this with optimizer or just with manual changes?
I'm not able to reproduce this. You'll need to provide your character and explain more in detail what you're doing.

Ill attack my last carecter optimization, as i cant try again right now cos i get mistake when i wanna download from battlenet.

So it just happens to me who is an idiot btw, sorry about waisint your time.
Its unique (2), so 2 red gems is allowed.
